summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of duso_ecom e-commerce agency website. All core features working correctly: animated canvas background, glass-morphism effects, floating cards, navigation between 6 pages, Shopify service first with gift, service tabs, testimonials carousel, mobile menu, CTA buttons, and footer links.

issues: Minor: Body had white background which could cause flash before canvas renders - FIXED by adding background-color: #0a0a0b to body in index.css

critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
Canvas animation renders correctly with particles, hexagons, and glow effects
Glass-morphism and floating-card CSS effects working properly
Color scheme (orange-500, emerald-500, black) correctly applied
Russian content displayed correctly throughout the site
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features tested and working. Site uses mock data from /app/frontend/src/data/mockData.js. Shopify service is first in the list with '10 топових товарів' gift. All 6 pages navigable: /, /about, /services, /portfolio, /resources, /contact. Mobile menu, service tabs, testimonials carousel all functional.
tests_passed: Canvas animated background renders on all pages
Shopify service shown first in services list
Gift for Shopify: '10 топових товарів для продажи' displayed
CTA buttons navigate to correct pages
mocked_data_note: ALL DATA IS MOCKED - Site uses /app/frontend/src/data/mockData.js for services, testimonials, portfolio, team, resources, etc.
